import { useContext } from "react" import CalendarContext, { View } from "../../Context/calendarContext" const DateView = ({ className }: { className?: string }) => { const { date, setDate, setView } = useContext(CalendarContext) return (
setView(View.Month)}>{date.monthName}
Mon
{date.daysColumns.Monday.map((date) => { return (
{date.getDate()}
) })}
Tue
{date.daysColumns.Tuesday.map((date) => { return (
{date.getDate()}
) })}
Wed
{date.daysColumns.Wednesday.map((date) => { return (
{date.getDate()}
) })}
Thu
{date.daysColumns.Thursday.map((date) => { return (
{date.getDate()}
) })}
Fri
{date.daysColumns.Friday.map((date) => { return (
{date.getDate()}
) })}
Sat
{date.daysColumns.Saturday.map((date) => { return (
{date.getDate()}
) })}
Sun
{date.daysColumns.Sunday.map((date) => { return (
{date.getDate()}
) })}
) } export default DateView
